roleset.name: to remove or obtain
roleset.note: EXTRACT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'extract' based on WSJ; nominal 'extracting' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls remove-10.1. (from extract.01-v)
EXTRACTING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from extracting.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Bond investors]-2 paid close attention to comments by Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan , who was testifying before a congressional hearing , but were n't able [*-2]to extract many clues about the future course of the Fed 's monetary policy .
example.arg: many clues about the future course of the Fed 's monetary policy

example.name: all arguments
example.text: But above all , this is the national headquarters for boiler-room operators , those slick-talking snake-oil salesmen who [*T*-1]-2 use the telephone [*-2]to extract money from the gullible and the greedy and then vanish .
example.arg: from the gullible and the greedy

example.name: nominal rel: extracting
example.text: They swear not to give up , if the extracting of bear bile from live bears does n't stop .

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Defendant oral surgeon was negligent in his extraction of plaintiff's wisdom teeth.

roleset.name: lineage, ancestory
roleset.note: EXTRACTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on on499-nouns-be (from extraction.02-n)

example.name: arg2
example.text: They were old - fashioned elegant gentlemen , who happened to be of German Jewish extraction
